resources.string: When the red box turns green,click as quickly as you can. Click anywhere to start.

The third little pig worked hard all day and built his house with bricks. It was a sturdy house complete with a finereplace andked like it could withstand the strongest winds. The next day, a wolf happened to pass bythe lane where the three little pigs lived; and he saw the straw house, and he smelled the pig insidepig would make a mighty fine meal and his mouth began to water.
